nodes.text: Dark Jedi Master robes were worn by those who had ascended the ranks of the Dark Jedi, those whose will and authority went unopposed in the era surrounding the Jedi and Sith Civil Wars. These black robes provided excellent protection while still offering the user full freedom of movement.

These robes look very similar to its lower counterpart, the Dark Jedi Knight Robe, but did have different mechanics like the Master robe offered a little more defense to the wearer than the Knight Robe did.
